result.title: Open Data repositories
result.description: To support open data we will register a data repository to support research findings with digital object identifiers keep frozen software versions and act as one of the main data repositories for public data used in the project MONOCLE will feature more than one data repository eg observation data will be openly available through a web visualisation portal and living software code will be hosted in private and public repositories While functionally different there will be overlap between the data held in these repositories This deliverable will be delivered jointly with the Data Management PlanTasks 9192

result.title: Data management plan
result.description: The data management plan briefly documents the data production storage and dissemination architecture foreseen at the start of the project The data management plan further describes how data generated within the project and obtained from external sources under diverse licenses will be managed so that they are Findable Accessible Interoperable and Reusable FAIR The data management plan shall further satisfy the points made as part of Ethics requirement 3 Tasks T53 T11 Ethics requirements

result.title: MONOCLE low-cost sensors support package
result.description: Open designs documentation multimedia support of MONOCLE lowcost sensors This includes the generic design and interface for MONOCLE apps which run on personal mobile devices providing connectivity to individual sensor hardware and the MONOCLE network It is provided to assure openness in future software development of the MONOCLE sensor framework Task 23
